Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.leaders

Class LeaderCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.leaders.LeaderCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasStatus, WinPointsCountable
public class LeaderCard extends Object implements WinPointsCountable, HasStatus
The LeaderCard class represents a leader card of the game, each card has its own ability, winPoints and requirements needed to buy it. It can be activated if the player has the right quantity of requirements, and it can be discard by the player in exchange for a faith point.

  • Constructor Details

    • LeaderCard

      public LeaderCard​(int id, SupplyContainer reqSC, ArrayList<CardsRequirement> reqCR, LeaderAbility abil, int points)
      Creates a leader card.
      Parameters:
      id - card id
      reqSC - a SupplyContainer which contains all the supplies needed to buy the LeaderCard
      reqCR - an ArrayList of CardRequirement which contains the details about the SupplyCards needed to buy the LeaderCard
      abil - the type of the LeaderCard's ability
      points - win points given by this leader when active

    • LeaderCard

      public LeaderCard​(int id)
      Creates a leader card.
      Parameters:
      id - card id

    • getCost

      public Pair<SupplyContainer,​ArrayList<CardsRequirement>> getCost()
      The getCost method returns a pair which contains all the requirements needed to buy the LeaderCard.
      Returns:
      a pair which contains all the requirements needed to buy the LeaderCard

    • getAbility

      public LeaderAbility getAbility() throws LeaderException
      The getAbility returns the ability of the LeaderCard.
      Returns:
      the ability of the LeaderCard
      Throws:
      LeaderException - the LeaderCard is not active yet or if it has been discard

    • getAbilityTrusted

      public LeaderAbility getAbilityTrusted()
      The getAbility returns the ability of the LeaderCard, whether the leader is active or not
      Returns:
      the ability of the LeaderCard

    • activate

      public void activate() throws LeaderException
      The activate method activates the LeaderCard.
      Throws:
      LeaderException - leader cannot be activated, because it was already discarded or activated

    • discard

      public void discard() throws LeaderException
      The setDiscard method discard the LeaderCard.
      Throws:
      LeaderException - leader cannot be discarded, because it was already discarded or activated
